numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The supply of non-clean energy in the United States is generally dropping.
3. The power generation in China seems to have a similar trend.
4. The power generation in India seems to have a similar trend.
6. I wonder how this graph correlates with the passing of economic laws.
7. Solar tax credits are economic laws.
8. Wind tax credits are economic laws.
9. This graph helps to inform me.
10. This graph helps to inform my community.
11. This graph informs us about the source of the power that we use.
12. This graph informs us whether this power is sustainable for future generations.
13. The headline is: World super-powers in more ways than one: How China and the United States get their energy.
